title: Ancient Worlds.(Arhaioi Kosmoi) Tv series. greek subs.(episode 4
description:
H megali symparagogi toy SKAI(Elladas) kai toy BBC mas
ksenagi se ena synarpastiko taksidi istorikis anakalipsis:apo ti gennisi ton ethnon,eos tin anaptyksi tis thriskias kai tis protes sygroyseis anamesa sti dynami kai ti thelisi,to nomo kai tin koinoniki eleftheria.
  Ektinetai se tris ipiroys,istorikoi, arxeologoi kai
alloi eidikoi mas miloyn gia tis protes poleis.

  The big co-production of SKAI TV(Greece) and the BBC
takes us to an exciting journey of historic discoveries: from the birth of nations, to the discovery of religion and the very first conflicts
between the power and will, the law and social freedom.
  In all three continents, historians, archeologists
and other specialists tell us about the first cities.

Epeisodio 4

O Richard Miles eksetazei oli tin poreia tou Megalou Aleksandrou. Ksekinontas apo tin Ellada, pernontas stin Tourkia kai stin Syria kai sinehizontas ston Livano,
stin Aigipto kai telos sto Pakistan, sta ihni tou Megalou Andros...

Episode 4

Richard Miles examines all the course of Alexander the Great. Starting from Greece, through Tourkey and Syria
all the way to Lebanon, Egypt and finaly Pakistan, on
the traces of the Great Man...
